word: \93Resist the devil, and he will flee from you. Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you.\94 How precious to the tempted soul is this positive promise. If those in trouble and temptation keep their eyes fixed on Jesus and draw nigh to God, talking of His goodness and mercy, Jesus draws nigh to them, and the annoyances that they thought almost unbearable vanish. . . .
